page.title: 13TOURISM
page.content: {WAGON WHEELS HOLIDAY PARK} THEY GET APPROXIMATELY 10,000 PEOPLE A YEAR AND IF THEY DO NOT GET ENOUGH PEOPLE A YEAR TO KEEP THEM GOING THEY DO SPECIAL ATTRACTIONS LIKE COACH TRIPS AND THEY LOWER THEIR PRICES AND SOMETIMES THEY DO REALLY BIG THINGS LIKE SWIMMING GALAS AND DISCOS. THEY HAVE THERE THINGS LIKE PONY RIDES AND A SWIMMING POOL AS SIDE ATTRACTIONS.THEY GET MORE PEOPLE DURING THE SUMMER BECAUSE OF THE SWIMMING POOL.IF THE WEATHER IS BAD THEY HAVE INDOOR ACTIVITIES.IF THEY HAVE AN ACCIDENT THEY JUST QUITE SIMPLY CALL THE LOCAL DOCTOR OR 999 AND THEY HAVE BEEN KNOWN TO TAKE THEM TO THE HOSPITAL THEMSELVES ONE OR TWO TIMES.THEY DO NOT HAVE ANYTHING FOR NON RESIDENTS WHO DO NOT STAY THERE.THEY HAVE ROUGHLY ABOUT 140 CARAVANS AND UNLIKE MOST HOLIDAY
